name: Pin-it!
description:
Pin-It is a shooting game where you have to impale the right target on the wall by matching the colors.

It's fast paced, hardcore and full of ways to express your mastery.

Give a try to the web version but be sure to download the game on your phone for the best experience. Android version is now available on Play Store!

We will release the game on iOS very soon, subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated!

If you want an early access to the mobile version, just let us know in the comment section and we will send it to you.

Your help and feedbacks will be appreciated ;)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS
    • Touch to load your shot
    • Drag to aim
    • Release to shoot

The canon will move horizontaly where you touch the screen, but it cannot move above the white line.

There are others subtilities with the controls, don't hesitate to talk about them in the comments.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SOUND

SFX made with the fantastic LabChirp!

Music: Around the Bend by Evan Schaeffer - CC-BY 4.0
